headline: IBM Elects Ramon L. Laguarta to its Board of Directors
summary: The IBM (NYSE: IBM) board of directors has elected Ramon L. Laguarta to the board, effective March 1, 2026.

headline: Bank of America resets IBM price target after earnings
summary: IBM (IBM) reported a strong Q4 earnings report on January 28, and the stock closed 5.13% higher on the next day, according to Yahoo Finance. Investors reacted more positively to Q4 earnings than they did in Q3, which was also a strong earnings report. I covered Q3 in my article “Bank of America ...

headline: Earnings live: Sandisk stock soars on profit beat, Verizon stock climbs, Exxon and Chevron beat estimates
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear this week, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.

headline: IBM Bond Sale Puts Fresh Funding And Valuation In Investor Focus
summary: International Business Machines (NYSE:IBM) has issued several billion dollars equivalent of new multi currency bonds in US dollars and euros. The callable, fixed rate corporate bonds were launched in early 2026, making IBM one of the first large tech issuers to tap credit markets this year. The offerings highlight investor demand for technology company debt and may influence how other tech names approach funding in 2026. For investors watching NYSE:IBM, this funding move comes with the...

headline: Heard on the Street Thursday Recap: Gold Swings
summary: Gold prices went haywire. A 9.4 percentage point swing in gold futures prices between the intraday high and low was the largest range since April 2013, according to Dow Jones Market Data. Futures settled slightly up on the day, at a new record high.
